definition: stratagem of convenience (idiom); stop-gap measure/makeshift plan/interim step

policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy

sentences.english: A thinking person realizes that the right way and the expedient way are not always the same.
sentences.chinese: 聰明人明白正確的方法和權宜之策是不同的。
